message:
SYSTEM: Deep_learning_applications_OEG.pdf: Página 41
LSTMs 4
forget gate layer
what information is going to be 
throw away from the cell state
input gate layer
decides which values are updated 
in the cell state
a tanh layer creates a vector of 
new candidate values
these two outputs are combined 
to create an update to the state
output gate layer
the output for the repeating 
module, a filtered version of the 
cell state 
41
speaker: SYSTEM
